body_html: Doesn't that defeat the purpose of having a separate CPU and GPU library? The point is to let CPU apps link against the CPU lib, GPU apps link against the GPU+CPU lib, and not have things explode when you link the CPU app and the GPU app together.
body_text: Doesn't that defeat the purpose of having a separate CPU and GPU library? The point is to let CPU apps link against the CPU lib, GPU apps link against the GPU+CPU lib, and not have things explode when you link the CPU app and the GPU app together.
body: Doesn't that defeat the purpose of having a separate CPU and GPU library? The point is to let CPU apps link against the CPU lib, GPU apps link against the GPU+CPU lib, and not have things explode when you link the CPU app and the GPU app together.
